answer:
If you have a paper copy of your grandchildren's immunization records, provide them to your closest health unit. Use the health unit finder. Information on how to submit immunization records to Fraser Health (Surrey health units) is detailed here.
If you do not have a copy of their immunization records, contact the Richmond health unit and request a copy to provide to Fraser Health.
Immunization Nurse
question: My grandchildren recently moved to Surrey from Richmond. What do we have to do to get their immunization records transferred to a Surrey Public Health Unit? Thank you
question_variation_0: transfer immunization records to phunit Surrey PHU
question_variation_1: can immunization records be transferred to a  Surrey public health unit
question_variation_2: what to do to get immunization records transferred to a Surrey Public Health Unit
